text: @CatHobbs @EdzardErnst @MattHancock Here in South Australia there was talk about privatising SA Pathology until this crisis. Right at the start SA Path quietly took the decision to test every single respiratory sample for Covid-19 (something a private business is unlikely to do). Privatisation now off the table.
